full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL ZHING 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA RNGAMS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG CHEN PA DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL ZHING 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA RNGAM PA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MGON PO KHANG PA DGA' CHEN LUNG RIGS KYIS BSKUL BAS MTSAMS SBYAR ZHING RANG NYID KYANG MOS PA CHEN POS BSKUL TE, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
